highlights.headline: Hunter Goodman gives Colorado lead with 2nd HR
highlights.description: Hunter Goodman punches his second home run of the game with a 2-run blast to give the Rockies the lead in the top of the fifth inning vs. the Marlins.

tracking.trackingName: MLB_One-Play (Hunter Goodman gives Colorado lead with 2nd HR) 2025/06/02 ESHEET

highlights.headline: Colorado Rockies vs. Miami Marlins: Game Highlights
highlights.description: Colorado Rockies vs. Miami Marlins: Game Highlights

tracking.trackingName: MLB_One-Play (Colorado Rockies vs. Miami Marlins: Game Highlights) 2025/06/02 ESHEET

video.headline: Colorado Rockies vs. Miami Marlins: Game Highlights

tracking.trackingName: MLB_One-Play (Colorado Rockies vs. Miami Marlins: Game Highlights) 2025/06/02 ESHEET

headlines.description: — Hunter Goodman homered twice, including a go-ahead two-run shot in the fifth inning, and the Colorado Rockies beat the Miami Marlins 6-4 on Monday night to snap their fourth eight-game losing streak of the season.
headlines.shortLinkText: Hunter Goodman homers twice as Rockies beat Marlins 6-4 to end 8-game losing streak

highlights.headline: Angels make history with 3-HR 1st inning at Fenway Park
highlights.description: Zach Neto, Mike Trout and Jo Adell all go yard in the opening frame as the Angels become the first road team in MLB history to homer three times in the first inning at Fenway Park.

tracking.trackingName: MLB_One-Play (Angels make history with 3-HR 1st inning at Fenway Park) 2025/06/02 ESHEET

video.headline: Angels make history with 3-HR 1st inning at Fenway Park

tracking.trackingName: MLB_One-Play (Angels make history with 3-HR 1st inning at Fenway Park) 2025/06/02 ESHEET

headlines.description: — Mike Trout had three hits, including a three-run, 454-foot homer off the left-center field light stanchion in the Angels' six-run first inning on Monday night and Los Angeles held on to beat the Boston Red Sox 7-6.
headlines.shortLinkText: Trout has 3 hits, including a home run, and Adell has two homers, to lead Angels past Red Sox 7-6

events.name: Los Angeles Angels at Boston Red Sox

highlights.headline: Yelich bashes 13th long ball of the year
highlights.description: Christian Yelich mashes a solo home run in the third inning for the Brewers.

tracking.trackingName: MLB_One-Play (Yelich bashes 13th long ball of the year) 2025/06/02 ESHEET

headlines.description: — Christian Yelich hit his fourth home run in six games and the Milwaukee Brewers extended their winning streak to eight games, beating the Cincinnati Reds 3-2 Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Christian Yelich's homer powers Brewers to 8th straight win, beating Reds 3-2

highlights.headline: Kerry Carpenter goes for 3 HRs as Tigers crush White Sox
highlights.description: Kerry Carpenter's three home runs power the Tigers to a blowout win over the White Sox.

tracking.trackingName: MLB_One-Play (Kerry Carpenter goes for 3 HRs as Tigers crush White Sox) 2025/06/02 ESHEET

headlines.description: — Kerry Carpenter hit a career-high three homers and drove in five runs to help the Detroit Tigers pound the lowly Chicago White Sox 13-1 on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Carpenter hits 3 homers as the Tigers reach 40 wins by pounding the White Sox 13-1
